verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: One and a half years later] , [ARG0: the Russia controversy] [ARGM-TMP: still] [V: dogs] [ARG1: Trump] and he still bashes the media for its coverage of his presidency and its potential ties to the Kremlin .

One and a half years later , the Russia controversy still dogs Trump and [ARG0: he] [ARGM-TMP: still] [V: bashes] [ARG1: the media] [ARG2: for its coverage of his presidency and its potential ties to the Kremlin] .
